SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into income (drawExtid, proofUrl, proofPrice, status, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime) values (#{drawextid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{proofurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proofprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update income set drawExtid = #{drawextid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, proofUrl = #{proofurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proofPrice = #{proofprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opName = #{opname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opId = #{opid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, drawExtid, proofUrl, proofPrice, status, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime from income
